SRP.Q: In 1965, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing GeoThermal Bloom Plant relative to Verdant Biomass Facility?
SRP.A: In 1965, GeoThermal Bloom Plant is {below} Verdant Biomass Facility in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Verdant Biomass Facility, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1957 relative to that in 1964 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Verdant Biomass Facility, the data point in 1957 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1964.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Stellar Wind Array's Renewable Energy Production levels?
VPR.A: Stellar Wind Array's renewable energy production levels show a {single peak} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Verdant Biomass Facility's Renewable Energy Production levels?
VPR.A: Verdant Biomass Facility's renewable energy production levels show a {exponential rising} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of GeoThermal Bloom Plant's Renewable Energy Production levels?
VPR.A: GeoThermal Bloom Plant's renewable energy production levels show a {stable falling} trend.

VPR.Q: What is the trend of Azure Tide Energy's Renewable Energy Production levels?
VPR.A: Azure Tide Energy's renewable energy production levels show a {volatile falling} trend.

NC.Q: Between 1958 and 1966, which line experienced the largest change in Renewable Energy Production, Stellar Wind Array, Azure Tide Energy, GeoThermal Bloom Plant, or Verdant Biomass Facility?
NC.A: {Verdant Biomass Facility} experienced the largest change in renewable energy production.

NC.A: In 1973, {Verdant Biomass Facility} had the highest renewable energy production.

NC.Q: In 1974, which line had a higher Renewable Energy Production, {Verdant Biomass Facility} or {Azure Tide Energy}?
NC.A: In 1974, {Verdant Biomass Facility} had a higher renewable energy production.

NC.Q: In 1972, which line had the highest Renewable Energy Production, Verdant Biomass Facility, Azure Tide Energy, or GeoThermal Bloom Plant?
NC.A: In 1972, {Verdant Biomass Facility} had the highest renewable energy production.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Verdant Biomass Facility. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(2 points need to be provided)
